name: Foobar Giveaway
#lang: Update the languages list you require (always keep `en` as fallback),
run `npm run translations` to generate the translation files for those languages (if not present already),
and modify those translation file values. Important comments are available in the `en` translation file.
Also update `src/i18n.ts` to include all language resource files. Use the `en` one as an example.
